entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, being tortured by unknown forces.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Being tortured in the cellar, her scream is heard by Harry.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who can Disapparate and help Harry escape.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: One of the people Dobby is supposed to take with him to Bill and Fleur's.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Another person Dobby is supposed to take with him to Bill and Fleur's.

entities.name: mr. ollivander
entities.description: A wandmaker who appears to be barely conscious.

entities.name: bill and fleur
entities.description: The couple whose cottage Dobby is supposed to take the others to.

entities.name: tinworth
entities.description: A location where Bill and Fleur's cottage is located.

entities.name: shell cottage
entities.description: The specific cottage of Bill and Fleur that Dobby is supposed to take the others to.

relationships.description: Harry asks Dobby if he can Disapparate with humans, and Dobby nods.
Harry tells Luna to go with Dobby to Bill and Fleur's.
Harry tells Dean to go with Dobby to Bill and Fleur's.
Dobby takes Mr. Ollivander's hand as he prepares to Disapparate.
Harry tells Dobby to take the others to Bill and Fleur's cottage.
Dobby is supposed to take the others to Shell Cottage on the outskirts of Tinworth.
